casebody.data:
Richard SCAMPONE, as Executor of the Estate of Madeline Scampone, Respondent
v.
GRANE HEALTHCARE COMPANY, Grane Associates, L.P., Highland Park Care Center, LLC, d/b/a Highland Park Care Center, Trebro, Inc., Petitioners Richard Scampone, as Executor of the Estate of Madeline Scampone, Respondent
v.
Grane Healthcare Company, Grane Associates, L.P., Highland Park Care Center, LLC, d/b/a Highland Park Care Center, Trebro, Inc., Petitioners Richard Scampone, as Executor of the Estate of Madeline Scampone, Respondent
v.
Grane Healthcare Company, Grane Associates, L.P., Highland Park Care Center, LLC, d/b/a Highland Park Care Center , Trebro, Inc., Petitioners No. 421 WAL 2017
No. 422 WAL 2017
No. 423 WAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. June 26, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 26th day of June, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED. The motions for leave to file an amicus brief by UPMC and the Pennsylvania Health Care Association are DENIED.
